Text: FYI Memorial Day Holiday Consolidated DPR Reportingto the U S and London markets being closed Monday May in observance of Memorial Day in the United States and Spring Bank Holiday in London the Consolidated DPR for Friday May will be reported Tuesday May Any trading activity that occurs in countries that do not observe a holiday on Monday will be combined with Tuesday May trading activity and reported on the Consolidated DPR on Wednesday May Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Johnny Thibodeaux

RE Gas Violations FINAL Cc the Enron Americas Gas Trading violation memo for VaR Maturity Gap Risk and Net Open Position for May The Office of the Chairman for Enron Americas is responsible for printing out a hard copy of this memo signing it and returning the hard copy to Chris Abel who will forward it to RAC to obtain their signature Thank You
